intro: Hibbertia notabilis, commonly known as the showy hibbertia, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the Dilleniaceae family and is characterized by its bright yellow flowers with red or orange markings. The plant typically grows in coastal areas and has hairy, linear leaves. Hibbertia notabilis is often found in sandy or rocky soils and is adapted to harsh environmental conditions. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens in suitable climates.
